The key word "same type". same day same stock same payment type is 1x commission. same day same stock different payment modes (Cash/CPF/SRS) then comm is charged for each payment modee.g. buy 10000 shares Sinktel using Cash  then buy another 5000 Sinktel using CPF on the same day. comm is charged 2x
